title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Explore Valley Forge There are a number of ways to experience the history and nature that Valley Forge has to offer. Be sure to check our event calendar to see if anything special has been scheduled coinciding with your visit.    Â            Ranger Programs   Join a ranger on an interactive walk or program.        Tour the Encampment   Explore the encampment either by car or by trolley.              Trails and Paths   Explore close to 30 miles of trails throughout the park.        Activities for Children   Valley Forge has many programs and events tailored specifically for our younger visitors.        Historic Tales   Participate in interactive stories with the expert storytellers of Historic Philadelphia Inc.
